text.tspan: Bottleneck text (autoregressively decoded activations from layer 20 of Gemma-2-2B, 26 layers)

g.text: → france Elle famille We ….. Elle Tu Madame
→ Tu Tu Tu parle étu manger a danseTu
→ has Vous France Have fille devoirs voiture bien as
→ A avoir Have français homework chocolat téléphone chien un
→ Dog You avez français chien? petit chien
→ =" korean question do YOU Do YOU Have =
→ Do spanish girl noun you HAVE you, Do
→ you does Portuguese dog HAVE dog HAVE cat you
→ have portug DOES dog dog DOG a dog have
→ a having portug DOG MEAN dog DOG dog a
→ dog Have SPANISH? PERSON?? DOG dog
→ france Elles verbs maman ….. Vous Juliette Abbiamo
→ The Les français Homework nuages girls apples voitureLes
→ enfants Les français dormir Jardin joue calcio jouent enfants
→ jouent enfants Playing france quartier football à dehors jouent
→ dehors enfants OUTSIDE Ville jouer. aujourd dehors
→ = italian means children PLAY children CHILDREN The =
→ the french CHILDREN happiness CHILDREN children CHILDREN kids The
→ children german where playground PLAYING play play PLAY children
→ play portug children MEANS outdoor OUTSIDE outside OUTSIDE play
→ france Ils maison Noun ….. Vous Kate Elle
→ Je Je français I étudier manger dormir lesJe
→ mange eat Je France lunch pomme une des mange
→ du Eat français Eating croissant pizza poisson sucre du
→ Pain bread France eat baguette croissant domani pain
→ = italian nouns eat I I EAT I =
→ i german bread eat eat BREAD eat FOOD I
→ eat french I bread knowledge BREAD food BREAD eat
→ france Verbs maman ….. Vous Pierre Elle …..
→ Ma My français homework soeur maman voiture friendMa
→ Maison My France house est est petit est maison
→ is house My France appartement Grande jolie petite est
→ Grande est house SMALL. Maison je grande
→ = german adjective MY HOUSE MY HOUSE My =
→ my portug adjectives HOUSE house HOUSE house HOUSE My
→ house YOUR spanish big IS HOUSE IS big house
→ is SPAIN house big GOOD big HOUSE big is
→ france maman verbs ….. Vous maison Ils Juliette
→ Ils They français dormir école joue café sontIls
→ regard Frenchmen Elles regarde, jouent pas trouve regard
→ regarde children They écoute télévision football tv leent
→ la regarder télévision France enfant tv lumière télévision la
→ Télé watching TVFRANCE maman. ordinateur télé
→ = german THEY watch THEY THEY THEY THEY =
→ they spanish tv watching sleep WATCH watch TV They

text.tspan: Despite being trained only on English text, the autoencoder also interprets French (gemma-2-2b is multilingual).
NB: french words are labelled as french. Other european languages also sneak in for reasons that are not clear. Some amount of just 'recovering input', but clearly also more.
